com.att.aro.model

Class RemoteVirtualInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.aro.model.RemoteVirtualInterface

  • public class RemoteVirtualInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    For Mac OS machine. This class start/stop Remote Virtual Interface. It also start tcpdump which is capturing packet and save it as .pcap file. This class require Sudo password to perform tcpdump command.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteVirtualInterface(java.lang.String sudoPassword) 
      RemoteVirtualInterface(java.lang.String sudoPassword, ExternalProcessRunner runner) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getErrorMessage()

      java.util.Date getTcpdumpStopDate() 
      int getTotalPacketCaptured() 
      boolean setup(java.lang.String serialNumber, java.lang.String pcapFilePath)
      Start Remote Virtual Interface (RVI), which is required before tcpdump can capture packet in device
      void startCapture()
      start new tcpdump command in background thread
      void stop()
      Stop RVI and stop packet capture.
      void stopCapture()
      stop background thread that run tcpdump and destroy thread
